title: Case-Based Learning Design Scenarios for Integrated Dental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous educational course integrating case-based learning and integrated supervision for dental concept education targeting general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can integrate oral health management concepts through the analysis of actual dental medicine case studies.
Learners can explain horizontal and vertical knowledge connections using case materials provided in the LMS platform.
Learners can complete dental medicine-related real-life problem-solving projects by incorporating integrated supervisory feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
